import{USER_PROFILE_SUCCESS,USER_PROFILE_REQUEST,USER_PROFILE_FAIL}from'../actions/actionTypes';var userProfileReducer=function userProfileReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){// Profile
case USER_PROFILE_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case USER_PROFILE_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,user:action.payload};case USER_PROFILE_FAIL:return{loading:false,payload:action.payload};default:return state;}};export default userProfileReducer;
